channel.description: A cleaned-up version of the original gaming feed for thesixthaxis_com

item.title: Something for the Weekend – 12/07/25
item.content:encoded:
Another weekend of melting to endure, so VR is well out of the question. Do you have something else on your gaming to-do list? Perhaps some faux outdoorsiness with Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3+4?

In the News This Week

Let’s catch up on the news of the week, with the Subnautica 2 fallout one of the biggest stories by far.

  • STALKER 2: Heart of Chornobyl announced for PS5
  • Subnautica 2 delayed to 2026, just a week after Krafton fired studio co-founders
  • Krafton slings dirt at fired Subnautica 2 execs, who then declare a lawsuit
  • Romero Games considers future after Microsoft cuts funding to their FPS project
  • Game publisher lobbyists unsurprisingly disagree with Stop Killing Games movement
  • New Routine screenshots shared as Lunar Software give a rare development update
  • The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered patch adds a chronological story mode
  • Nintendo is ending the Switch Game Vouchers promotion next year
  • Adorable Adventures is an exploration game about uniting a baby boar with his family
  • A Wild Hearts S demo is now available for Switch 2

Games in Review & Featured Articles

We had a clutch of games in for review this week, and the hand-waving of Maestro won Gamoc’s heart.

  • Maestro – PSVR 2, Quest, Pico, PC VR – 9/10
  • Copycat – PS5, XSX|S, PC – 7/10
  • KinnikuNeko: SUPER MUSCLE CAT – PS5, XSX|S, PS4, XBO, NSW, PC – 7/10
  • FBC Firebreak – PS5, XSX|S, PC – 6/10
  • Gex Trilogy – PS5, XSX|S, NSW, PC – 6/10

Aside from that, Tuffcub popped the fancy had on for Kayak VR: Mirage – Yucatán DLC, while Dom went hands on with the “apocalyptic space ninja cheerleader brawler” of Ra Ra Boom.

And rounding out the week, What We Played featured my hands on with Gex, Maestro and Ninja Blade

Trailer Park

Watch the Ghost of Yotei gameplay reveal

Jurassic World Evolution 3’s first new species revealed as the Lokiceratops

That’s the round up for this week’s round up, enjoy the weekend and we’ll see you for more gaming gubbins on Monday.



https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/07/12/something-for-the-weekend-12-07-25/
